value.name: JUSTIFYING THE FORCE: Initial description of George Floyd's death fits larger pattern at MPD
value.description: One of the first officers who showed up to the north Minneapolis apartment complex where Jamar Clark was shot and killed in 2015, later told state investigators that she turned off her dash camera as she arrived on scene, according to investigative records ...

value.name: Five Minneapolis City Council members: Our case for changing the charter on policing
value.description: In Minneapolis, we are responsible for making change together. Inaction on the charter's mandate on policing restricts the solutions we can consider.

value.name: ‘They Have Lost Control’: Why Minneapolis Burned
value.description: After George Floyd’s death, pent-up frustrations, provocateurs and inexperienced leadership led to mayhem for three nights.

value.name: 'Staggering' number of Minneapolis cops seeking disability benefits
value.description: The total now is closer to 200, out of a sworn force of about 850 and amid a wave of violent crime in the city.

value.name: As Mayor of Minneapolis, I Saw How White Liberals Block Change
value.description: By Betsy Hodges Ms. Hodges was the mayor of Minneapolis from 2014 to 2018. Democrats have largely led big and midsize cities for much of the past half-century. Yet the gaps in socioeconomic outcomes between white people and people of color are by several measures at their worst in the richest,

value.name: Black Lives Matter Activist: Abolishing The Police '100%' Means Just That
value.description: Miski Noor, an organizer and activist with Black Visions Collective, speaks about the ongoing protests sparked in response to the police killing of George Floyd.

value.name: 'My department left me in there to die': Many Minneapolis police cite PTSD in seeking disability benefits
value.description: The continued surge of Minneapolis police officers seeking disability benefits after the George Floyd unrest is heightening concerns of a police staffing shortage amid a wave of violent crime. Ron Meuser Jr.

value.name: These Are The Minneapolis Activists Leading The Push To...
value.description: She too participated in the encampment outside the police station after Jamar Clark's killing in 2015 and has worked to form alliances between Minneapolis' Black and Native-American communities.

value.name: These Are The Minneapolis Activists Leading The Push To Abolish The Police
value.description: She too participated in the encampment outside the police station after Jamar Clark's killing in 2015 and has worked to form alliances between Minneapolis' Black and Native-American communities.
